name: strava_scrape_dashboard
description: Scrape the Strava dashboard/activity feed. Requires login.

steps.code: const activities = []; document.querySelectorAll('.activity, [class*="FeedEntry"], .feed-entry').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 10) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.entry-owner, a[href*="/athletes/"]'); const titleEl = el.querySelector('.entry-title, h3, a[href*="/activities/"]'); const statsEl = el.querySelector('.entry-stats, .stat'); activities.push({ athlete: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', stats: statsEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { activity_count: activities.length, activities };
